text: @RobertJenrick If everybody with Covid-19 had done the same where would we be now? At a time of national crisis exemplary leadership matters. This isn’t it. It’s an abject failure of leadership by Cummings, Johnson and those ministers who copy and paste stock messages of support. Disgraceful.
